item.title: 4 Essential Resources for learning R Programming
item.description: [caption id=“attachment_604” align=“alignnone” width=“200” class=“center”]R Logo[/caption] Step by Step Guide to Learning R Step 1 Download R. Download R Studio. Learn R Fundamentals Data Camp is a good place to start. Corsera also has R courses for free. Have experience with programming, you can start here. Make your data pretty using ggplot2. Jump into machine learning with Kaggle. Titanic Machine Learning tutorial.

item.title: 4 Essential Resources for learning R Programming

item.title: How Green Screens Really Work - The No BS Quick Tutorial
item.description: Green Screens 101 - Fastest Tutorial Review of an affordable green screen that is transportable and sets up quickly. This short 4 minute video is the best way to show how to set up a green screen studio. I will provide the actual links to the products at the end of the review so the page is not cluttered with ads. Watch the video to be convinced how easy this is!

item.title: Five Minute GitHub Tutorial with RStudio - Simple!
item.description: What is a GitHub? Recently, I went to search for a few jobs in the tech industry and one thing stood out with each of the sites I visited. Everyone was asking “What’s your GitHub address?” Admittedly, I didn’t have one until just the other day. I posted this short five minute tutorial to get you started early! GitHub is a repository for version control hosting of coding projects and much more.

item.title: Overview of the VBA Editor, Reading VBA Code, and Eliminating Waste
item.description: [embed]https://youtu.be/GNulOwQT0mk[/embed] Overview of the VBA Editor, Reading VBA Code, and Eliminating Waste First, a quick overview of how to record and run macros. Then the tutorial shows the user how to manually check the VBA code for a particular macro. How to change module names and macro names. Also a few key terms such as Integrated Development Environment (IDE). A few key takeaways form this tutorial. Open the VBA Editor

item.title: First C++ Program; Online Compiler, DevC++ and Downloading Free Compilers!
item.description: H-e-l-l-o W-o-r-l-d, And welcome to, what is most likely, your first C++ tutorial. You have taking the first step to entering into the world of programming. What better choice than to begin your journey with learning C++? In this post, you will learn how to download free compilers and create your first “Hello World” program. Or, perhaps, if you want to just dabble a bit, get your feet wet with a free online complier.
